sentence.Network_en: Now, Acipenser sinensis fish are endangered and therefore require strict protection.
sentence.Network_cn: 现在, 中华鲟鱼有濒于灭绝的危险,因此要求严加保护.

sentence.Network_en: Mai Budiao Acipenser sinensis for many years the farmers feel financial pressure.
sentence.Network_cn: 长年卖不掉的中华鲟让养殖户备感资金压力.

sentence.Network_en: Acipenser sinensis fish life is very long, can live Yierbainian.
sentence.Network_cn: 中华鲟鱼的寿命很长, 可活一二百年.
